website_summaries.verdict: Though its structure was far from unique, the Under Armour Toccoa proved to be an excellent neutral running shoe for the trails. The majority of its users were impressed with the various design elements and performance. The Toccoa did have its fair share of criticism, especially regarding fit and feel aspects.
pros: Many users agreed that the Under Armour Toccoa was a stylish and comfortable shoe
The fit was secure yet unrestrictive, one wearer noted
The tread pattern on the outsole worked well on rocky trails, according to a reviewer
A user remarked that the upper material looked and felt durable
One runner said the shoe did not require a break-in period as it was comfortable starting from the first use
The leather upper felt bizarre at first, but it later proved to be a viable material for a trail running shoe, commented a customer
cons: The shoe was very wide and ill-fitting, according to a customer
One buyer complained that the shoe was not flexible and that it felt cheap
The outsole did not grip on smooth surfaces, a reviewer said
One user did not like that the insole was not removable
Some people complained that the laces were frequently coming undone
Many testers disapproved of this running shoe’s narrow toe box

customer_reviews.title: Not so bad that I’ll return it
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 10.5 and it’s a little bit big. Not so bad that I’ll return it. Very comfortable shoes. We'll see how well they hold up. Update. I’ve had the shoes for about four months. I use them primarily for running and also for normal daily use on occasion. The soles are already wearing out and losing grip. Kind of disappointed because they’re very comfortable and they look good. But they don’t seem like they’re going to last much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Worthington

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for the money
customer_reviews.text: Had these shoes for about 3 months now and I can say not only are they durable but they still look good. I have fallen arches and these shoes offer great support and don’t deform with the extra pressure on the sides. I have been using these for work and exercise and could not be more pleased with how they feel. There is however some slight wear on the top mesh that could potentially get bigger. This showed up after a wash in the washing machine so I would recommend washing these by hand. I will say that I have been pretty rough on these so I would expect them to be showing some signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Browning

customer_reviews.title: Good for LEOs or Military
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoe. Breathable and look sharp with any green uniform for all you SEB LEO’s out there or Army fellas that may have options on what to wear for call outs, drills, PT, etc. Blend well with camo or dark green uniforms. 👌🏽 I replaced the wack neon orange laces with some $8 flat dark green laces from Amazon. Look is all-around consistent now and looks sharp. Not sure about kickin down doors but your ju-jitsu and foot pursuits will increase by 9,000.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I just got these shoes on Thursday 2/7/19 and I worked out in them a couple times but today I finally got to run in them and I ran 4 miles only but I must say....these might be the best shoes I have ever run in, they’re extremely comfortable and offer a ton of support and cushion, I have two bad knees and a bummed foot and for the first time in a long time I have no pain after my run, I was previously running in new balance that were ok but offered no cushion for my runs so I felt pain after my runs, I will be buying these again once my current pair are worn out 👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: michael alexander maldonado

customer_reviews.title: these shoes achieve a perfect blend of cushioning and weight management
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5' 10", 215 lbs and average about 6 miles/week on a moderate trail. For me, these shoes achieve a perfect blend of cushioning and weight management. I really like that the outsole has uniform tread and cushioning, especially in the arch. My feet don’t ache after a run and I feel like I recover faster. I’m sticking with Under Armour on all future running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: 1/2 size small
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Shoe runs a 1/2 size small and narrow. I would suggest ordering 1/2 size larger and if you have a wide foot the 4E extra wide
customer_reviews.author: jody mcginnis

customer_reviews.title: Watch out
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these running shoes for the Tillman and was excited to find a “military” style shoe but there is one problem. I received returned by a previous purchaser shoes. It’s obvious due to the laces being laced and there is zero tissue in the shoes to hold form. I am very displeased but after close inspection of the product I am going to keep the shoes.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The sizing seems true to size length-wise, but I think it's a bit on the narrow side in the toe box. If you're wide or borderline wide, you may not like these.
customer_reviews.author: Steve B.

customer_reviews.title: Size up a half size
customer_reviews.text: I really like these Under Armour shoes! Last pair I had lasted a very long time & were very comfortable. These seem to be a 1/2 size smaller & not as comfortable as the Storm pair I had but they are still better the the super expensive Nike Air Max that I've pretty much quit wearing cuz they are so uncomfortable. Overall I will break them in & should be fine despite them being on the small side. I had an 11 1/2 before so I figured these should be ok since there wasn't a 12 in stock. I would recommend a 12 wide for this size but seem to be out of stock everywhere on these
customer_reviews.author: Norton74

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Semi snug need a wide but sizing is correct just need broke in! Pictured as shown.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Possible KnockOff??
customer_reviews.text: Having to return these after only one week of wear. The mesh frayed and I discovered a hole in top fabric. I'm starting to question the validity of these shoes.... Arrived in a plain brown box, no identification of Under Armour. Received another pair that had several defects, as well. You get what you pay for!!
customer_reviews.author: kwil

customer_reviews.title: A review 400 miles later...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these in August 2019 for work. To date I have walked around 400 miles with these shoes. They are just as comfortable as the day I first put them on. There have been some issues with the top mesh not holding up. This only started a week or so ago. I am currently looking for a replacement for work, but I will continue to wear these as my daily shoes since they are still so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander C. Chamberlin

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: Got my normal 8.5, a little too big. The style in the feont looks normal but the back/heel is this very weird round part. Looks really weird. Returned for size issue and they were dirty when i got them, so i think they were previously returned.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah!

customer_reviews.title: More No, then Yes.
customer_reviews.text: If developing the bunion on big finger (image1), not much arch support(image2), and not promt balance support(image3) does not bother you, than try this shoes. The shoes feel good and light on the foot, the sizing and 4e width are true.
customer_reviews.author: D.G rEvIeWs.

customer_reviews.title: The gray/green color combination looks very nice. My shoes are still new so I cannot ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoe fits as expected, I usually order 1/2 size bigger. UA shoes tend to be 1/2 size small for me anyway. The gray/green color combination looks very nice. My shoes are still new so I cannot give an honest rating on durability, but the build quality looks nice. They feel light for a trail running shoe. I have other UA shoes that I use to work out in and they’ve held up well. I recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: WD

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: After wearing nothing but Nike sneakers for 15 years and kind of creating my own orthotics by adding tape to the insoles I fine these Under Armour shoes fit perfectly and very adjustable by how I tighten the lashes at the toe and mid sections. Very good for walking city streets.
customer_reviews.author: Janniegrrl

customer_reviews.title: Great design and quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two pairs of Under Armour shoes at 11.5. My normal shoe size is 11. I am glad I did because my feet do fit very well with just a little extra room for my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Fitness XL

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little narrow compared to other under armour shoes
customer_reviews.text: Seems to run quite a bit smaller and narrower in the toe box area. I own many pairs of under armour shoes and boots. By far the narrowest. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Russell J.

customer_reviews.title: So far, excellent
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel of these shoes. To be fair, I don't run in them; just use them for strength training workouts at the gym, and to occasionally wear around town. Have had them for two weeks, and so far, I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Syndergaard

customer_reviews.title: Good fit.
customer_reviews.text: My husband is pretty easy to please when it comes to online shopping for his shoes. Buy his size and 9 times out of 10 it's going to fit. He is quite happy with these UNDER ARMOUR shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Holle

customer_reviews.title: Instastink
customer_reviews.text: Foul odd chemical smell after two days of use. I don't have smelly feet and not sure what that smell is but it's nasty. Sending back! Insoles are thin and uncomfortable too. Size was fine. But that smell.....dry climate no moisture, no excuse.
customer_reviews.author: Kaptainkaveman

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best shoes I've ever owned. I was a die hard nike fan for years before trying these. Now I'm team under armour all the way. The support you get is great and the style is amazing. I get asked all the time where I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Best

customer_reviews.title: Nearly perfect. Actually these ARE perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice Lightweight, well made, they fit great -- these are WIDE ENOUGH!!! So comfortable! Good support. Really stylish to my mind. Some of the nicest athletic shoes I've ever worn. Really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon M. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable and provided excellent traction in an obstacle course race
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable and provided excellent traction in an obstacle course race. I use them for HIIT style workouts as well as heavy compound lifting and they have enough support without feeling squishy like some running shoes feel. Great shoes all around and fit as expected
customer_reviews.author: WontonSoup!

customer_reviews.title: Made For My EE Feet
customer_reviews.text: Bought these primarily as daily lounging shoes and for running errands. I also wore them on an airplane trip to Michigan and then on a road trip to Toronto. So comfortable! My EE feet feel great and I can walk for hours in these.
customer_reviews.author: Funky Monk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Wide Feet!
customer_reviews.text: I have wide, flat feet. Like, 'ask the saleperson for your widest pair of shoes in the store and then see if you can order those wider online'. These actually have soles that don't curve in and have my feet busting over the sides. If you need wide shoes, go with these... Or a pair of Keen's.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky D

customer_reviews.title: A sturdy shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is holding up well to an active lifestyle. Looks good with jeans and shorts besides being durable. The color is a good balance between light and dark.
customer_reviews.author: NotYourEveryday

customer_reviews.title: Try it on in a store instead.
customer_reviews.text: Larger than the version found in the store. Soles are incredibly slippery and certain surfaces. Visible adhesive lines where the sole meets the upper. Really poor quality from Under Armour. Too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Biehl

customer_reviews.title: Look great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought these and they are true to size. We have only had them few weeks but he has bough several Under Armor tennis shoes in the past and they last for years- and he is rough on them!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Sito

customer_reviews.title: Sole of shoe became partially unglued
customer_reviews.text: The front inside sole of my shoe came unglued only after a couple of months. I've never had this happened to any shoe which I have ever owned. The price was good but I guess you get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: I’m surprised, and would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: For the price I couldn’t beat it. A little bit older and not as hard on my shoes as a kid would be, and they’ve held up great for the last year I’ve had them.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Shoes fit perfect but the problem is that the mesh is getting ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit perfect but the problem is that the mesh is getting holes in several spots and getting worse. I feel they need replaced either the same or different shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Hounchell

customer_reviews.title: Not enough cushion in  bottom of shoe
customer_reviews.text: My husband has neuropathy In his feet I was hoping they would have more cushion it did not they hurt his feet not good!! Nice looking shoe but hurt!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Willden

customer_reviews.title: UA does trail shoes rigth
customer_reviews.text: For whatever reason UA just seems to get trail shoes right. The heel to toe ratio is perfect and I just do not seem to have the same issues I have with other running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Gator70

customer_reviews.title: ... I have found that UA shoes are the most comfortable for me
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I have found that UA shoes are the most comfortable for me. They also hold up better than most. These fit as expected and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My experience - get a size up
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews, I ordered a size 10.5, a half size bigger than I usually wear. It's acceptable, but 11 would certainly fit better.
customer_reviews.author: Giorgi

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe, Okay Look
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality, but the look isn't quite the Under Armor feel since the heel is so flat. Overall comfortability is great for daily work and all black means they won't look dirty after a couple of weeks of wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: NeverB4

customer_reviews.title: We love the Taccoa's. Will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.text: I buy these very 6 months. My husband is a very busy electrician. He works about 100 hours a week. He loves them. Wont wear any others. They are the most comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Love the comfort of these shoes. They are perfect for casual use as well as for exercise. They look nice, as well as feel and perform as good as they look.
customer_reviews.author: Big water boy

customer_reviews.title: Width
customer_reviews.text: Bought for sisters birthday and the shoes are too narrow she wears them but they hurt her feet!
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Very narrow and not as comfortable to run, let alone walk in. Kinda disappointed in how they look in person. They look cheaply made, wore them once and haven’t touched them again. Going to donate them to someone who could benefit them. Wouldn’t recommend you buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. They're for my son and he's hard on shoes (and everything else). But these still look great.
customer_reviews.author: Jarel

customer_reviews.title: Just when I find a great pair of shoes they stopped making them
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes they ever made I'm so sad they stopped making them
customer_reviews.author: Urshoozuntyd

customer_reviews.title: Really nice comfy shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really like Under Armour mens shoes, and these ones are great. Really comfy, I walk in these quite a bit while working on the house or just out and about. Really nice shoes and the price was really fair when I bought them
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Great fit out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Great fit out of the box. Will write more of a review after I getting moving in them to see how they hold up. Only gave it four stars because I pay for prime 2 day. Ordered on 8/22/18 and took until 8/27/18.
customer_reviews.author: cpa

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I like all Under Armour shoes and primarily have been using these just to walk around. Took them camping and they grip well in gravel and dirt. Nice neutral color.
customer_reviews.author: uferreal42

customer_reviews.title: Happy Husband
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband's birthday and her is very happy. He is happy with the look and treads. He also said they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: I seen these shoes on an email that I received from amazon. I ordered them and they are way better in person. These are probably the coolest shoes ever!!! They are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soles are worn within 2 months of light usage
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe as I get compliments as well, although light weight, they last a very short amount of time with light usage. I would not recommend as a shoe for activity, more like for an outing with friends
customer_reviews.author: Collegeguy07

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Had these shoes for months and they are holding up really well. Fit great. Usually wear New Balance shoes. Thought I'd give these a try and I love them.
customer_reviews.author: James R Hyer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, stylish
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are exactly like in the description, true to color and size. I have the 12.5 and they fit great. Extremely comfortable to walk around in, i feel like I can go all day in them. Pick them up if you can.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, feel good
customer_reviews.text: Great looking, feel good, although just a tiny bit smaller than other size 11 shoes. But 11-1/2 may have been too big. Shipping wasn't very fast; ordered on the 31st of March and shoes were delivered 12 April.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Augustus

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Light material, great tread, comfortable, and fit as expected! Would definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Richi

customer_reviews.title: Decent shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes that fit well and are comfortable. My only gripe is the grip. They are slick on certain surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Miller

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: My husband says it’s comfortable and lightweight. Definitely, nice pair of shoes!
customer_reviews.author: love JESUS!

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They fit perfect and are comfortable. Would have given 5 stars if the insoles were able to come out.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Bala

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wish they were lower profile but they are still a good looking shoe and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Quality didn’t seem great
customer_reviews.text: Returned it on arrival as the quality didn’t seem worth it given the brand name. The shoe was pretty flexible though but didn’t feel super comfortable. Visually appealing however
customer_reviews.author: Basundhara Parasar

customer_reviews.title: Sizing issue but otherwise good.
customer_reviews.text: Width ok. Small otherwise. Been wearing a 13 my whole adult life...never had toes cramped at top of shoe. Otherwise comfy.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: the size 11.5 and 12 are exactly the same. So If you're a 11.5, the size 12s will be the size to get.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Good Gym Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Good for gym doing different exercises but not great for running. A little on the heavy side. Don’t get me wrong though they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Coco B Ware

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe so far
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a budget mountain bike shoe. Solid construction for the trails and grip my pedals well.
customer_reviews.author: Firefighter#27

customer_reviews.title: Most uncomfortable UA shoe ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Shaped funny. Only size 10 of my 4 pairs of UA shoes that rub my big toe Not comfortable at all. When I close my eyes I think I am wearing Nikes.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Under Armour Sneakers:  The best sneakers money can buy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing comfort. Great style. Perfect for anyone with a bad back but doesn’t want to sacrifice style.
customer_reviews.author: JerzeeMike

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable/ cheap
customer_reviews.text: Not comfortable for long walks or hiking. Fell apart in a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: DaHAUS

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: For a first time hiker (him) he finds these shoes very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Harper

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable I use them for flats riding my mountain bike
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of these I have bought. Very comfortable I use them for flats riding my mountain bike. They are solid and grip pedals excellent.
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful well made shoes
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes. The grip pattern on the soles is very effective and allows for traction on most any surface. The shoe itself is very well made,is very breathable and in general looks pretty awesome. I would definitely suggest this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Not very comfortable, made kind of wide in the front and the soul isn’t cushioned at all. Might as well be walking barefoot. The design looks nice but was disappointed with how uncomfortable these were.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable - but high back that digs into you
customer_reviews.text: Only compliant i have is that the back lit digs into your heel. At least in my case. Apart from that it fits well and is very comfortable. A little on the heavy side, but i like heavy shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These are probably my favorite Under Armor shoe that I own. Very comfortable for walking, running, and even lifting. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Amaris

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Fit maybe a hair smaller than perfect but would not order a different size. Good quality. Great shoe!
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: While the base is flexible, the firmed side provide extra stability for the foot. This is an excellent shoe at a very good price!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra D

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Good overall shoe to work out in. Running on treadmill three times a week and are comfortable
customer_reviews.author: alfredo l.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish & Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: For the money, very happy with style and shoes fit nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Star-Star

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Husband loves them. They fit as his other Under Armour sneakers do. Square toe space. Great charcoal color.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn M

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair in 3 years wear 3 to 4 times a week...
customer_reviews.author: Rob Hefland

customer_reviews.title: Its 4E extra wide shoes
customer_reviews.text: These say medium when selecting them say 4E at checkout page... I did not notice that and bought them as a gift and they didnt fir. Very upsetting.
customer_reviews.author: Mr & Mrs D

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: I think the fit was off a bit, they made me walk a little sideways. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Marwood

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes, just ran big for me.
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear shoes between size 9 and 10.5. However, this pair which was supposedly 9.5 was far too big. I liked the style but just ran big for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dan B.

customer_reviews.title: Defective U/A shoes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered & received these shoes June 18. Today, 2 months later, the sole is coming off!! That’s horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Barb L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of under armour shoes. They fit perfectly and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Patriot2.0

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my 12 year old son. They fit true to size and are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyof20607

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Boght them and they broke within a week tried contacting seller no use
customer_reviews.author: SUBIENATION0218

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: very comfy shoe for working out in, cardio! not super soft for long distance.I would buy this again, order half size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Runs a half size smaller than usual. Had to return and get a 12 instead of 11.5. Great looking shoe, breathable and stylish. Offers below average cushion for heal and arch.
customer_reviews.author: Otis Spunkmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for my husband when his last pair wore ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband when his last pair wore out and he loves them, has even had people at work ask him where he got them!
customer_reviews.author: lisa p.

customer_reviews.title: Not my type
customer_reviews.text: They look like clown shoes, but they've been somewhat comfortable to use for work. Overall I wouldn't buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Fairly priced.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for walking and wearing all day. Round shoe laces tend to come untied if you don pull tight on the knot.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth C. Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite under armour shoe purchase to date! Fits nice, feels nice on my feet and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves these. Comfort is good and size is right.
customer_reviews.author: Khinkle

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my husband. I thought the colors were really cool and I have come to love most things by Under Armour. He loved these shoes. He says they are comfy and fit well.
customer_reviews.author: danielle

customer_reviews.title: The teenager approves!
customer_reviews.text: My teenager likes these shoes👟 . The size was perfect (true to size) and he says they’re comfortable! I got them for $59.99.
customer_reviews.author: Tle

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Although they do run a little small (be sure to get half a size larger than normal size), they look nice and super comfy.
customer_reviews.author: K-Trek

customer_reviews.title: Durable & breathable
customer_reviews.text: Quality sneaker that lasted until he outgrew! 11 year old boy who is tough on his sneakers loved these! Buying the next size up.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Hughes

customer_reviews.title: its smaller in size, i would go half bigger, need insoles if you have a bad back
customer_reviews.text: shoes look nice, i had to by insoles right off the bat, small in size, if i order again i would go a size bigger then my boots i wear
customer_reviews.author: Shelley your a cunt

customer_reviews.title: Prefect running shoe
customer_reviews.text: I got this product to run and I've started to run 24 miles a week and ive been doing this for 2-3 months and only using these shoes for running so keep that in mind they are currently keeping up with the wear and tear that i put on my regular running shoes and 10/10 will use these for my only running shoe from now on
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Very hard soles
customer_reviews.text: Shoes feel a bit spacious which is good because you’re going to need some insoles. These are probably the least cushioned shoes I’ve ever bought. I bought them for work but can’t understand how anyone could run in them and not have bruised feet and sore joints.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. Talbert

customer_reviews.title: True to the 4e
customer_reviews.text: Great gym shoe, fits as expected for a wide foot
customer_reviews.author: N8

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Looks more like the work shoes I get From work
customer_reviews.author: Muddy truck F150

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Toccoa Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Upper combines lightweight, durable leather with breathable tough, ripstop textile. Built-in webbing adds structure & support. Die-cut, full-length EVA sockliner for added comfort & a custom fit. Cushioned EVA midsole delivers a lightweight & responsive ride. High-abrasion rubber traction outsole pattern for extended durability. Offset: 8 mm. Weight: 10.6 oz.
